titleStmt.title: A proposition demonstrated· That mill'd-lead is a better covering for churches, houses, &c. more durable, and above 20 per cent. cheaper than cast-lead; supposing that 16s. and this but 13s.6d. a hundred.
titleStmt.author: Hale, Charles, Mr.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Charles Hale. Cf. Wing (CD-Rom, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
